verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> unto Moses בְמִדְבַּר־ <WH4057> in the wilderness סִ֠ינַי <WH5514> of Sinai בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֜ית <WH8145> of the second לְצֵאתָ֨ם <WH3318> after they were come out מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <WH4714> of Egypt בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> in the first לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying
וְיַעֲשׂ֧וּ <WH6213> also keep בְנֵי־ <WH1121> Let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֖סַח <WH6453> the passover בְּמוֹעֲדֽוֹ׃ <WH4150> at his appointed season

בְּאַרְבָּעָ֣ה <WH702> four עָשָֽׂר־ <WH6240> teen י֠וֹם <WH3117> day בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> of this month הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> of this בֵּ֧ין <WH996> at הָֽעֲרְבַּ֛יִם <WH6153> at even תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> ye shall keep אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּמוֹעֲד֑וֹ <WH4150> it in his appointed season כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all חֻקֹּתָ֥יו <WH2708> according to all the rites וּכְכָל־ <WH3605> to all מִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <WH4941> of it and according to all the ceremonies תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> thereof shall ye keep אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> that they should keep הַפָּֽסַח׃ <WH6453> the passover

וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> And they kept אֶת־ <WH853> הַפֶּ֡סַח <WH6453> the passover בָּרִאשׁ֡וֹן <WH7223> of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <WH702> four עָשָׂ֨ר <WH6240> teen י֥וֹם <WH3117> day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <WH2320> month בֵּ֥ין <WH996> at הָעַרְבַּ֖יִם <WH6153> at even בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> in the wilderness סִינָ֑י <WH5514> of Sinai כְּ֠כֹל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> according to all that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> Moses כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> so did בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> were certain אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> And there were certain men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become טְמֵאִים֙ <WH2931> who were defiled לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> by the dead body אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of a man וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יָכְל֥וּ <WH3201> that they could לַעֲשֹׂת־ <WH6213> not keep הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> the passover בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֑וּא <WH1931> they וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <WH7126> and they came לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> Moses וְלִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> and before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> Aaron בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַ֠יֹּאמְרוּ <WH559> said הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> And those אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we טְמֵאִ֖ים <WH2931> unto him We [are] defiled לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> by the dead body אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of a man לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> why נִגָּרַ֗ע <WH1639> wherefore are we kept back לְבִלְתִּ֨י <WH1115> because הַקְרִ֜ב <WH7126> that we may not offer אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבַּ֤ן <WH7133> an offering יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּמֹ֣עֲד֔וֹ <WH4150> in his appointed season בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <WH413> about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> And Moses עִמְד֣וּ <WH5975> unto them Stand still וְאֶשְׁמְעָ֔ה <WH8085> and I will hear מַה־ <WH4100> to what יְצַוֶּ֥ה <WH6680> will command יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> what the LORD לָכֶֽם׃ פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> If any אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man כִּי־ <WH3588> If יִהְיֶֽה־ <WH1961> becomes טָמֵ֣א ׀ <WH2931> shall be unclean לָנֶ֡פֶשׁ <WH5315> by reason of a dead body אוֹ֩ <WH176> or בְדֶ֨רֶךְ <WH1870> or [be] in a journey רְחֹקָ֜הׅ <WH7350> afar off לָכֶ֗ם א֚וֹ <WH176> or לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> of you or of your posterity וְעָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> yet he shall keep פֶ֖סַח <WH6453> the passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <WH8145> of the second בְּאַרְבָּעָ֨ה <WH702> four עָשָׂ֥ר <WH6240> teen י֛וֹם <WH3117> day בֵּ֥ין <WH996> at הָעַרְבַּ֖יִם <WH6153> at even יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> they shall keep אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> with מַצּ֥וֹת <WH4682> it with unleavened bread וּמְרֹרִ֖ים <WH4844> and bitter יֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <WH398> it [and] eat

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> none יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <WH7604> They shall leave מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> of it עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> none of it unto the morning וְעֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> any bone לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor יִשְׁבְּרוּ־ <WH7665> nor break ב֑וֹ כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> of it according to all the ordinances הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> of the passover יַעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> they shall keep אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וְהָאִישׁ֩ <WH376> But the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who ה֨וּא <WH1931> he טָה֜וֹר <WH2889> that [is] clean וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> and is not in a journey לֹא־ <WH3808> not הָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become וְחָדַל֙ <WH2308> and forbeareth לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to keep הַפֶּ֔סַח <WH6453> the passover וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <WH3772> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> even the same soul הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he מֵֽעַמֶּ֑יהָ <WH5971> from among his people כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for קָרְבַּ֣ן <WH7133> not the offering יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הִקְרִיב֙ <WH7126> because he brought בְּמֹ֣עֲד֔וֹ <WH4150> in his appointed season חֶטְא֥וֹ <WH2399> his sin יִשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> shall bear הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> that man הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> If יָג֨וּר <WH1481> shall sojourn אִתְּכֶ֜ם <WH854> among גֵּ֗ר <WH1616> And if a stranger וְעָ֤שָֽׂה <WH6213> among you and will keep פֶ֙סַח֙ <WH6453> the passover לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כְּחֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> according to the ordinance הַפֶּ֛סַח <WH6453> of the passover וּכְמִשְׁפָּט֖וֹ <WH4941> and according to the manner כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> thereof so shall he do חֻקָּ֤ה <WH2708> ordinance אַחַת֙ <WH259> ye shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֔ם וְלַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> both for the stranger וּלְאֶזְרַ֥ח <WH249> and for him that was born הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land פ

וּבְיוֹם֙ <WH3117> And on the day הָקִ֣ים <WH6965> was reared up אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> that the tabernacle כִּסָּ֤ה <WH3680> covered הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> the cloud אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <WH4908> the tabernacle לְאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> [namely] the tent הָעֵדֻ֑ת <WH5715> of the testimony וּבָעֶ֜רֶב <WH6153> and at even יִהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> become עַֽל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <WH4908> there was upon the tabernacle כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> as it were the appearance אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> until the morning

כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> So יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> it was תָמִ֔יד <WH8548> So it was alway הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> the cloud יְכַסֶּ֑נּוּ <WH3680> covered וּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> it [by day] and the appearance אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> of fire לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> by night

וּלְפִ֞י <WH6310> And when הֵעָלֹ֤ת <WH5927> was taken up הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> the cloud מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over הָאֹ֔הֶל <WH168> from the tabernacle וְאַ֣חֲרֵי־ <WH310> then after כֵ֔ן <WH3651> after that יִסְע֖וּ <WH5265> journeyed בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבִמְק֗וֹם <WH4725> and in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יִשְׁכָּן־ <WH7931> abode שָׁם֙ <WH8033> there הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <WH6051> where the cloud שָׁ֥ם <WH8033> there יַחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> pitched their tents בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> there the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

עַל־ <WH5921> over פִּ֣י <WH6310> At the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD יִסְעוּ֙ <WH5265> journeyed בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְעַל־ <WH5921> over פִּ֥י <WH6310> and at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יַחֲנ֑וּ <WH2583> they pitched כָּל־ <WH3605> long יְמֵ֗י <WH3117> as long as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִשְׁכֹּ֧ן <WH7931> abode הֶעָנָ֛ן <WH6051> the cloud עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> upon the tabernacle יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <WH2583> they rested

וּבְהַאֲרִ֧יךְ <WH748> tarried long הֶֽעָנָ֛ן <WH6051> And when the cloud עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> upon the tabernacle יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וְשָׁמְר֧וּ <WH8104> kept בְנֵי־ <WH1121> then the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> the charge יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and not יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> and journeyed

וְיֵ֞שׁ <WH3426> And [so] it was אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יִהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> remained הֶֽעָנָ֛ן <WH6051> when the cloud יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days מִסְפָּ֖ר <WH4557> was a few עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <WH4908> upon the tabernacle עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֤י <WH6310> according to the commandment יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD יַחֲנ֔וּ <WH2583> they abode וְעַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> in their tents and according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> they journeyed

וְיֵ֞שׁ <WH3426> And [so] it was אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> remained הֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> when the cloud מֵעֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> abode from even עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> unto the morning וְנַעֲלָ֧ה <WH5927> was taken up הֶֽעָנָ֛ן <WH6051> and [that] the cloud בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְנָסָ֑עוּ <WH5265> then they journeyed א֚וֹ <WH176> or יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> whether [it was] by day וָלַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> or by night וְנַעֲלָ֥ה <WH5927> was taken up הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> that the cloud וְנָסָֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> they journeyed

אֽוֹ־ <WH176> Whether יֹמַ֜יִם <WH3117> Or [whether it were] two days אוֹ־ <WH176> or חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> or a month אוֹ־ <WH176> or יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> or a year בְּהַאֲרִ֨יךְ <WH748> tarried הֶעָנָ֤ן <WH6051> that the cloud עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <WH4908> upon the tabernacle לִשְׁכֹּ֣ן <WH7931> remaining עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> above יַחֲנ֥וּ <WH2583> abode בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> thereon the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and did not יִסָּ֑עוּ <WH5265> in their tents and journeyed וּבְהֵעָלֹת֖וֹ <WH5927> not but when it was taken up יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5265> they journeyed

עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֤י <WH6310> At the commandment יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD יַחֲנ֔וּ <WH2583> they rested וְעַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> in the tents and at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD יִסָּ֑עוּ <WH5265> they journeyed אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <WH4931> the charge יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD שָׁמָ֔רוּ <WH8104> they kept עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses פ
